attributes.action: Do not tax vehicles an extra £310 if list price is over £40,000
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair just to make vehicle tax more expensive just on the basis of the price of the car. If this was to then include emissions ect. I think this would be more reasonable.
attributes.background: I want parliament to debate on the matter of having to pay an extra £310 tax on the 2nd year up to the 5th year , solely because the list price of the car was over £40,000. The price of vehicle tax should only be based on emissions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552990
